verbs.description: The theory that Trump [V: was] appointed by God is not that uncommon within evangelical circles .
The theory that [ARG1: Trump] was [V: appointed] [ARG0: by God] is not that uncommon within evangelical circles .
[ARG1: The theory that Trump was appointed by God] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: that uncommon] [ARGM-LOC: within evangelical circles] .
